title: How to Make a Screaming Orgasm Layered Shooter

steps.title: Set a shot glass or cordial glass on a table.
steps.content: Set a shot glass or cordial glass on a table.

steps.title: Estimate the capacity (volume) the shot glass or cordial glass.
steps.content: Estimate the capacity (volume) the shot glass or cordial glass. Divide this by four, as each layered ingredient will take up about one fourth of the glass. This can be done by eye or with measuring cups. Leave a little extra space so that the last ingredient doesn't overflow from the glass.

steps.title: Pour the Kahlua directly into the glass so that it fills up about one fourth of the glass.
steps.content: Pour the Kahlua directly into the glass so that it fills up about one fourth of the glass.

steps.title: Using the technique described in the article Make Layered Shots, layer the amaretto liqueur over the Kahlua.
steps.content: Using the technique described in the article Make Layered Shots , layer the amaretto liqueur over the Kahlua. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Layer the Baileys Irish Cream over the amaretto liqueur.
steps.content: Layer the Baileys Irish Cream over the amaretto liqueur. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Layer the vodka over the Baileys.
steps.content: Layer the vodka over the Baileys.

steps.title: Serve the drink.
steps.content: Serve the drink. [3] X Research source
